title: Following listing, beer maker Kati Patang plans to acquire and incubate small alcohol businesses to expand | Company Business News - Mint
summary:
Kati Patang Expands with Plans to Acquire Small Alcohol Businesses

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Mint

Kati Patang Lifestyle, a craft beer maker, aims to expand its operations by acquiring and incubating small alcohol businesses as it recently went public through a share swap.

  • The company will grow both organically and inorganically over the next two years.
  • Its recent acquisition includes a stake in a UK brewery.
  • Kati Patang seeks to foster expansion while developing its own brands.
“We are looking to acquire and incubate domestic and international brands,” said co-founder Shantanu Upadhyay.

Kati Patang's strategy indicates a focused approach on scaling operations in the competitive alcohol market.
newTitle: Kati Patang Expands with Plans to Acquire Small Alcohol Businesses

title: Anant Ambani's fitness trainer, Vinod Channa, shares 3 ways to reduce belly fat - India.com
summary:
Anant Ambani's fitness trainer, Vinod Channa, shares 3 ways to reduce belly fat

Published Date: N/A Source: India.com

Vinod Channa, the fitness trainer who assisted Anant Ambani in his notable weight loss journey, provides three key strategies to effectively reduce belly fat.

How to Reduce Belly Fat in 3 Steps?

  1. Eat at regular intervals: Channa emphasizes the importance of regular eating to keep metabolism active without stressing the intestinal system.
  2. Work on abs at the right time: The optimal time for abs workouts is after larger muscle exercises to maximize calorie burn.
  3. Work on all muscle groups: Target all major abdominal muscles for comprehensive results.

Channa also stresses that each individual's weight loss journey is unique and tailored nutrition plans are essential.

About Vinod Channa

Vinod Channa is a highly sought-after celebrity fitness trainer known for his holistic approach to fitness and nutrition.
newTitle: Vinod Channa's Tips for Reducing Belly Fat

title: Mswipe bets big on international expansion | Company Business News - Mint
summary:
Mswipe bets big on international expansion

Publication Date: 31 December 2023

Source: Mint

Mswipe, a payments fintech backed by Alpha Wave Global, is set to expand its operations into regions like the UK, Malaysia, and Nepal to leverage higher margins. This follows a recent successful entry into the UAE and Singapore.

  • Mswipe is focusing on international expansion after a year of marginal revenue growth.
  • The plan includes entering markets such as the UK, Malaysia, and Nepal within the next six months.
  • The company aims to improve its profit margins through this strategic expansion.
“We are targeting high-margin markets to boost our growth,” said co-founder and CEO Ketan Patel.

This expansion reflects Mswipe's efforts to adapt its business strategy and improve financial outcomes amid market fluctuations.
newTitle: Mswipe Expands Internationally to Enhance Growth

summary:
OnePlus 13R launching in India on January 7: Price, design, specs and everything expected

Publication Date: N/A Source: Live Mint

OnePlus is set to unveil its flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 13R, at an event on January 7, alongside the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus Watch 3. This device is projected to be a key competitor in the premium mid-range segment for 2025.

OnePlus 13R expected specifications:

  • 6.78-inch 8T LTPO AMOLED display with 4,500 nits peak brightness.
  • Powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor with Adreno 750 GPU.
  • Support for up to 16GB of LPDDR5X RAM and 1TB of UFS 4.0 storage.
  • Triple camera setup with 50MP primary sensor, likely including a telephoto lens.
  • 16MP front camera.
  • IP65 rating for dust and splash resistance.
  • Expected to run OxygenOS 15 on Android 15.

In China, pricing starts at 3399 yuan for 12GB RAM/256GB storage model. Possible Indian price around ₹40,000 is still to be confirmed at the launch.
newTitle: OnePlus 13R launching in India on January 7: Price, design, specs and everything expected

title: Slimmer designs, AI-powered user experiences to repairable devices, 5 trends that will shape smartphones in 2025 - The Indian Express
summary:

Publication Date: 2024-12-05 Source: Indian Express

The article discusses the upcoming trends that are expected to influence the smartphone market in 2025, despite perceived stagnation in the industry. Key trends include the introduction of slimmer designs, enhanced AI features, improved security measures, and a focus on repairability.

  • Smartphones may have slimmer designs, with companies like Apple and Samsung introducing new models.
  • Greater integration of AI features to create personalized user experiences.
  • Enhanced security measures to protect against increasing cyber threats.
  • New software features to help curb smartphone addiction.
  • A push towards more repairable technology.
“As the market shifts toward premium phones, brands face mounting pressure to enhance the smartphone experience.”

Overall, the smartphone landscape is predicted to evolve with these trends while maintaining core functionalities.

Quordle Answers (January 01, 2025): Struggling to solve today's Quordle? No worries. We have today's Quordle hints and answers for you to solve it on your own!

If you're a fan of word puzzles, you probably already know that Quordle is a more challenging version of Wordle. Instead of guessing just one word, Quordle requires you to guess four five-letter words simultaneously within nine attempts.

Key Points:

  • Today's Quordle answers: CLING, SUITE, WORRY, TONIC.
  • Quordle Chill answers: SLATE, USAGE, COMIC, WHINE.
  • Quordle Extreme answers: BRUTE, PHONY, TIMID, TWIRL.
  • Quordle Sequence answers: STALK, CHAIN, ADULT, BOARD.
WARNING: Spoilers ahead! Only read on if you want to know today's Quordle answers.

Date: December 31, 2024

Chrome users are alarmed by a large-scale hacking incident affecting extensions, putting millions of users' data and security authenticity at risk. The issue was first reported by cybersecurity firm Cyberhaven, which fell victim to a phishing attack.

Key Points:

  • Phishing tactics allowed hackers to gain access to extensions.
  • Users are advised to avoid unknown links and consider using password managers.
  • The incident underscores the importance of security for Chrome extensions.

Users are urged to be vigilant and protect their accounts in light of this significant security breach.

Date: 31 Dec 2024 | Source: LiveMint

Astronaut Sunita Williams and the Expedition 72 crew will uniquely celebrate New Year’s by witnessing 16 sunrises and sunsets in just 24 hours while aboard the International Space Station (ISS).

  • Astronaut Sunita Williams and her crew are prepared to celebrate New Year’s Eve in a distinctive manner from space.
  • The ISS crew will see 16 different sunrises and sunsets during the 24-hour period of New Year's Eve and New Year's Day.
“Witnessing New Year 2025 from orbit is a truly unique experience!” - Sunita Williams

This celebration marks a remarkable event in space exploration and draws attention to human achievements in science and technology.

summary:
Apple Might Introduce 'ProMotion' Technology To iPhone 17 Series' Base Variants

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: 9To5Google

Apple is reportedly planning to introduce its ProMotion display technology across the entire iPhone 17 lineup, potentially bringing higher refresh rates to all models and significantly enhancing user experience.

  • ProMotion currently exclusive to Pro and Pro Max variants with up to 120Hz refresh rates.
  • Base models may feature refresh rates of up to 90Hz, closing the gap with Pro models.
  • This evolution reflects Apple's strategy to incorporate more advanced features into standard models.
  • The iPhone 17 series is expected to maintain distinctions between standard and Pro models, while still offering upgraded features.
“This upgrade for the standard models would still represent a significant improvement, narrowing the performance gap between the tiers.”

In conclusion, Apple is set to enhance the iPhone 17 series with ProMotion technology for base models, signifying a continued trend towards feature convergence across its product line.

title: Spotify faces backlash over pornographic content | Tap to know more | Inshorts - Inshorts
summary:
Spotify faces backlash over pornographic content

Published on: 10:31 am on Tuesday 31 December, 2024 | Source: Inshorts

Spotify has come under fire after users reported explicit pornographic videos appearing in search results for the artist M.I.A., leading to widespread criticism and frustration over the company's response time.

  • Users initially flagged the issue on Reddit, sharing images of inappropriate content found in search results.
  • Although the explicit link has been removed, many Spotify users are unhappy with the delay in Spotify's response to the problem.
Users expressed frustration with Spotify’s delayed response to the issue.

This incident sheds light on the challenges content platforms face in managing user-generated content and ensuring appropriate experiences for their audience.
newTitle: Spotify Faces Backlash Over Inappropriate Content in Search Results
